root.name: Sequence comparator
root.description: This plugin provides a convenient interface to measure and compare the differences between a reference sequence and several tested sequences. The user can chose among several the distance measure, such as mean square error, L1, maximum pixelwise, PSNR, SSIM, etc.
root.author: ylemontag - Yoann Le Montagner
root.changelog:
- Version 3.4.0.0 Date 2013-04-22 13:16:55
Fix compatibility issues with the SSIM plugin and display the numerical overall error in the Sequence Comparator main frame.
- Version 3.3.1.0 Date 2013-03-08 15:33:28
Fix: missing parse functions in VarGlobal/LocalComparator
- Version 3.3.0.0 Date 2013-02-07 15:55:59
Add: PSNR error measure
- Version 3.2.0.0 Date 2013-01-28 16:27:31
Simplification: remove ErrorMeasureBlock and ErrorMeasuresBlock => error measure results can now be visualized in a usual Display block Fix: no such method bug with IcyCanvas.setSyncId(int)
- Version 3.1.3.0 Date 2012-08-16 14:06:16
Fix: compatibility issue with SSIM plugin
- Version 3.1.2.0 Date 2012-08-03 15:23:30
Fix: VarEditor becomes SwingVarEditor
- Version 3.1.1.0 Date 2012-07-10 11:37:20
Fix: begin/endUpdate when allocating a sequence
- Version 3.1.0.0 Date 2012-06-21 16:19:16
Add: support for Blocks
- Version 3.0.0.0 Date 2012-06-21 15:55:00
Recover the previous 'Sequence comparator' plugin, that had to be deleted due to a classpath modification.
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-06-21 15:52:25
